channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- SiteGround Security

item.title: CVE-2023-0234|2024-08-02T05:02:44.113Z -- unknown -- siteground%20security
item.description: The SiteGround Security WordPress plugin before 1.3.1 does not properly sanitize user input before using it in an SQL query, leading to an authenticated SQL injection issue.
